name: Reckless Restless
description:
A warrior is brought back to life.

Because the invaders have arrived

With his shield and sword,

He will fight against the enemy horde.

And with the goddess on his side,

Death will be kind.

CONTROLS:

-Use AWSD and arrow keys to move your knees.

-Press R to rewind the war.

Game developed for the Game Jam "UDC Jam #24 - Death Is Good", 2022
